column6: _Mid-High Heat Engager. Shifts to DGF stance
_Long range mid Heat Enganger. Unsafe on block
_Heat Engager from stance. Very long range

column2:
1. Some DGF moves are enhanced
2. Sword attacks gain the properties of  their
NSS counterpart

column6: _Jumping approach tool that can shift to DGF stance
_A very fast attack for challenging situations

_These two can be a starting point to learn his many
_other stances and to create strong situations.
